root.name: Starry Sky ~in Spring~
root.description: OverviewStarry Sky ~in Spring~ is the first of the 4 games created by HoneyBee. The 4 games has 3 love interests each, totaling in 12 possible love interests. It has an adaptation of anime, manga and drama CDs.StoryStarry Sky takes place at Seigetsu Academy, specializing in astronomy and also a former all-boys school. Tsukiko Yahisa is the first female student to enroll. She then meets 3 other characters which personalities are all based on Western Zodiac Constellations.CharactersTsukiko YahisaJapanese Voice Actor: Fumiko Orikasa (anime)Tsukiko Yahisa is the heroine of all the Starry Sky games, she is a 2nd year student of Seigatsu Academy.Yoh TomoeJapanese Voice Actor: Hikaru MidorikawaYoh Tomoe represents the Zodiac Sign - Capricorn. He is half-french, his name in French is Henri Samuel Jean Aimée. He is a 2nd year.Kanata NanamiJapanese Voice Actor: Tomokazu SugitaKanata Nanami represents the Zodiac Sign - Pisces. Childhood friend of the heroine. He is a 2nd year.Suzuya TohzukiJapanese Voice Actor: Daisuke OnoSuzuya Tohzuki represents the Zodiac Sign - Cancer. Also a childhood friend of both the heroine and Kanata. He is a 2nd year.
